name: WrongPlanet.net - Clean Dark (Forum Only)
description: Gives the Wrong Planet forum a cleaner and darker look. Works on mobile devices as well :P
additional_info: --- Work in Progress --- This style is not finished yet. Some site elements will look a bit off while others wont be styled at all. Things will change with time, maybe a lot, maybe a little. For now, feel free to use the style whilst I'm working on it. --- Release Notes --- dev_01 - Initial dev/test build. dev_02 - Minor CSS clean up. dev_03 - Better support for mobile devices and smaller screens. dev_04 - Minor optimization and a few other minor changes. dev_05 - Smaller screens, general improvements, minor changes. dev_06 - General improvements to the overall look and functionality. More to come... dev_07 - Small update to fix the background image being applied on empty ads. dev_08 - CSS clean up, fixes for smaller screens and general improvements. --- Assets Used --- 'Stressed Linen' by Jordan Pittman Licensed under: CC BY-SA 3.0 Website: toptal.com 'Dark Prosilver Imageset' by Christian Bullock Licensed under: GNU GPLv2 Website: christianbullock.com (archived link) 'Silk Icons' by Mark James Licensed under: CC BY 2.5 Website: famfamfam.com --- License Info --- This style is licensed under GNU GPLv3.
